original_title: Texas Chainsaw Massacre: 20th Anniversary Cast Reunion
overview: Taped at Vintage Poster Art Convention & Auction April 22-24, 1994 (presented by Marty Davis & Morris Everett, Jr.) Sheraton Airport Hotel Cleveland, OH. Originally distributed on VHS to video stores through Facets in Chicago.
title: Texas Chainsaw Massacre: 20th Anniversary Cast Reunion
